And justly. For nothing besides ean touch a good teacher, as long as the affairs of his disciples go on to his mind. Through you, he says, we were comforted, that is, you have confirmed us. And yet the reverse was the case. For that when suffering they did not yield, but stood manfully, was sufficient to confirm the disciples.
